message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the sale of this amazing product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this fantastic item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $15000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase your product. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $14000 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still looking to get a good price for the product. I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $14500.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget, I would like to propose an offer of $14000 for the product.
I understand that you're still looking to get a good deal, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go any lower than $14200. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $14200.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts in negotiating. Considering my financial situation, I would like to propose an offer of $14000 for the product.
